WorkItem.Description:
ModernTab with Layout=List, does provide the __ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility__ and __ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility__. The __VerticalScrollBarVisibility__ property will be used for the entire (left and right) part of the control, where the __HorizontalScrollBarVisibility__ is only used on the left part.

It would be great if one could handle all of the Scrollbars (_missing_) not only the one __highligted__:
> entire part (left and right): __vertical__ and _horizontal_
> left part: _vertical_ and __horizontal__
> right part: _vertical_ and _horizontal_
WorkItem.Summary: ModernTab Layout=List, vertical ScrollViewer on left part
